name: Real True Skateboard-Legending Olympic Sports 2016
description:
Become the coolest property of the street stunt crew by performing electrifying moves in an all new Skateboard Street Skate 2015


ELECTRIFY THE STREETS WITH BRILLIANT ACROBATS


Immerse in an endless runner platform, with brilliant acrobatics and sensational street skate moves, as you travel the city’s tracks and turns to be crowned the skateboard street skate king.


Avoid obstacles and people on the street, and as you encounter the various stunt curves throughout the tracks, let out the inner Skateboard Street Skate King and dazzle everyone with unique stunt moves.


SHOW OFF YOUR SKILLS AND YOUR ACHIEVEMENTS


Run for your life throughout the city tracks, riding your faithful skateboard. The longest run will earn you the title of the coolest stunt runner in town, and brag about it to friends on social media platforms like Facebook and twitter.


STREET SKATE 2015 GAMEPLAY


Navigate in an endless runner throughout the city, take sharp drifts and turns by titling your device. Be sure to catch all collectibles along the way to boost your scores.


But mind you! These tracks will not be as friendly as they seem. A large obstacle can appear from any side to block your path, rendering your Street Skate Runner unconscious!


Now’s the time to show off all skills that you’ve practiced for years. Get out there and show em what you’ve got.


FEATURES


- Fast paced skateboard runner gameplay

- Brilliant jump and skateboard stunt animations

- Share your high scores on Facebook and Twitter
